unnormalised: Arrey yaar, pesticide usage is a big issue! Especially in our Bharat. I remember seeing farmers near my native place, Kerala, using so much. Maybe sustainable farming practices can help? Like the ones promoted by IARI. Hope we can reduce it during Onam season for safer biryani. Rs. 5000 subsidy helps, I guess. 20 km away too much reliance on chemicals! It's 2024, we gotta change!
